fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 127.40 points or 0.68% to settle at 18,726.40. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, rose 0.54% to 11.44. RIL, Tata Motors and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
